name: 書報討論（二）
goals: To realize the related topics of technical and vocational education development in our country
To explore the current situation of technical and vocational education development in developed country
To deliver academic paper on technical and vocational education

1

5

6

7

8

Discussions on academic journals of technical and vocational education development in developed countries

9

10

11

12

Discussions on academic journals of technical and vocational education  with manpower supply and demand

13

14

15

16

17

18

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
